title: Hollywood Princess
description: Malibu, Aspen, Beverly Hills!Fast Cars, Private jets!Celebrity parents, Celebrity friends!This is the life of Elizabeth Jacobs, born and raised in the highest echelon of Los Angeles society. So what’s she doing living in a dorm room, and eating off the meal plan? Rebellion, Hollywood style. The girl with the enviable life - famous parents, entrée to everything, and never being told “no,” wants to escape the glamour of her childhood and enter the real world, one where no one knows her name.Life couldn’t be better if you’re Danny Newman, the hottest guy in Hollywood. As the son of an A-list director, the world belongs to Danny. There are A-list parties, the requisite Porsche, and beautiful woman begging to be his. But maybe what the complicated college student really wants isn’t any of this.Book 1 of 4 in the Hollywood Princess series (NA/Mature YA)
author: Dana Aynn Levin
